```{r Libraries, echo=TRUE}

library(cowplot)
```

```{r}
CCDR_transposed_Japan<-read.csv(
  "../Data/Raw/Transposed_CCDR_Japan.csv",
                             stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
CCDR_transposed_Japan$Year <- lubridate::ymd(CCDR_transposed_Japan$Year , truncated = 2L)
```

```{r}
mytheme <- theme_classic(base_size = 14) +

        legend.position = "right")

theme_set(mytheme)
```
